name: Botanas
disc: A sampler of our delicious home-style specialties (4) fajita bean & cheese nachos (4) chicken flautas (4) fajita quesadillas & chile con queso dip. Served w/ guacamole, sour cream & pico de gallo.

name: Pepe’s Shrimp Cocktail
disc: Plump, juicy shrimp in a Mexican style cocktail sauce w/ fresh tomatoes, onions, chopped cilantro & avocado slices. Mild or Hot.

name: Quesadillas
disc: Three flour tortillas loaded w/ Monterey Jack cheese, onions, tomatoes, poblano peppers & choice of our delicious fillings. Lightly grilled & served w/ guacamole, sour cream & pico de gallo.

name: Nachos
disc: Tortilla chips topped w/ mixed cheeses, jalapeño peppers & your choice of toppings. Served w/ guacamole & sour cream.

name: Fried Taquitos
disc: Three old-fashion style tacos fried then stuffed w/ lettuce, tomatoes & cheese.

name: Guacamole
disc: Served over shredded lettuce & topped with diced tomatoes.
